channel.title: Teaching on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Two steps forward, one step back
item.description: Tuesday I was a guest speaker at Mrs.A’s gifted class. She’s teaching a group of 9-12 year olds web design and asked if I’d come in an talk for an afternoon. So I spent 30 minutes talking to them about the basics of user centred design and how the internet works. Then I helped them trouble shoot their table based layouts and font tags.
